entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trail
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
